title: Orange Domains: Bridging Traditional DNS with Bitcoin’s BNS for Enhanced Web3 Connectivity
description: Trust Machines, a leading Bitcoin infrastructure development company, has unveiled its latest venture, Orange Domains, with the ambitious goal of revolutionizing the way the Bitcoin Name System (BNS) operates.  The new entity is set to enhance the functionality of BNS domains, fostering greater integration with the traditional Domain Name System (DNS) and paving the way […]

title: Marathon mines largest-ever Bitcoin block on record
description: The recent mining of the largest-ever Bitcoin block has captured the attention of the cryptocurrency community, signaling a significant milestone in the evolution of blockchain technology. This monumental achievement, achieved through a collaboration between Marathon Digital’s Slipstream and OrdinalsBot, underscores the growing interest in innovative approaches to data inscription and distribution. title: U.S. national debt climbs by at least $1 trillion every 3 months
description: The U.S. is witnessing a rapid increase in its national debt, marking a significant uptick by approximately $1 trillion every 100 days. Recently, this trend has become more pronounced, with the debt ballooning to over $34 trillion as of early January. This acceleration is a departure from previous patterns where the rise to similar amounts […]

title: Bitcoin ETFs trigger institutional gold rush, predicts MicroStrategy co-founder
description: The launch of spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) has sparked a decade-long institutional “gold rush” for Bitcoin, according to Michael Saylor, the co-founder and executive chairman of MicroStrategy. Speaking at the Bitcoin Atlantis conference on March 1, Saylor suggested that Bitcoin has entered a “high growth institutional adoption phase,” projecting this trend to continue until […]
